select b.id, u.name as userName, c.name as classify,
from blog b left join user u on b.userId = u.id left join classify c on b.classifyId = c.id where b.status = 1 and b.isDelete = 0 and b.label regexp '^${tag}$|^${tag},|,${tag}$|,${tag},' order by b.id desc
select count(*) from blog where status = 1 and isDelete = 0 and label regexp '^${tag}$|^${tag},|,${tag}$|,${tag},'

select b.id, u.name as userName, c.name as classify,
